00023 using System.Web;
00024 using Utilities.FileFormats.RSSHelper;
00025 #endregion
00026 
00027 namespace Utilities.Web.Craigslist
00028 {
00032     public static class Craigslist
00033     {
00034         #region Public Static Functions
00035 
00043         public static Document Search(string Site, Category Category, string SearchString)
00044         {
00045             return new Document(Site + "/search/" + Names[(int)Category] + "?query=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(SearchString) + "&catAbbreviation=" + Names[(int)Category] + "&minAsk=min&maxAsk=max&format=rss");
00046         }
00047 
00048         #endregion
00049 
00050         #region Private Static Variables
00051 
00055         private static string[] Names ={"sss","art","pts","bab","bar","bik","boa","bks","bfs","cta","ctd",
00056             "cto","emd","clo","clt","sys","ele","grd","zip","fua","fud","fuo","tag","gms","for","hsh",
00057             "wan","jwl","mat","mcy","msg","pho","rvs","spo","tix","tls"};
00058 
00059         #endregion
00060     }
00061
